derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Italian, from Latin vindicta 'vengeance'

entry.def: If one person has a vendetta against another, the first person wants revenge for something the second person did to them in the past.

example.ex: The vice president said the cartoonist has a personal vendetta against him...
example.tran: 副总裁说那个漫画家和他有私怨。

example.ex: His murder was a vendetta killing.

means.word_mean: 1. a feud in which members of the opposing parties murder each other
